title: Harry S. Cummings buys the house
body: Additional research is needed to determine if Cummings purchased or rented the house.

title: NAACP offices on Druid Hill Avenue
body: Additional research is needed to determine when the NAACP opened in the property.

title: Freedom House opens
body: After the NAACP moved to E. 25th Street, the Freedom House opened in the former office on Druid Hill Avenue.

title: Freedom House is sold to Bethel AME Church
body: Lillie Mae Carroll Jackson sold the property to Bethel AME Church with a requirement to maintain the property for public use.
